title: LCR Meter
subtitle: 4 models from 20 Hz to 100 kHz, 200 kHz, 500 kHz, and 1 MHz

paragraphs: The 4300 Series LCR meters offer a blend of simplicity and functionality, making accurate and rapid measurements possible from 20Hz to 1MHz. Designed with versatility in mind, these meters are suitable for a wide range of applications within both testing and production settings.

applications: Component manufacturers and quality control laboratories

features.title: Broad Frequency Range
features.description: Capable of testing components from 20Hz to 1 MHz, particularly the 43100 model, catering to a wide array of applications

features.title: High Accuracy
features.description: Offers a basic accuracy of 0.1%, ensuring reliable and precise measurements

features.title: Fast Measurement Time
features.description: Less than 25ms measurement time, enhancing productivity in fast-paced environments

features.title: Versatile Measurement Parameters
features.description: Supports a comprehensive set of parameters including C, L, Z, Y, X, B, Rac, Rdc, G, Q, D, and Ø

features.title: Dual Test Mode
features.description: Allows for consecutive measurements with two different instrument parameters, such as two AC measurements at different frequencies or an AC and a Rdc measurement

features.title: Display Capability
features.description: Can display up to four parameters simultaneously in two test mode, providing comprehensive data at a glance

features.title: Adjustable Drive Level
features.description: Offers a drive level range from 10mV to 2Vrms, accommodating various test conditions

features.title: Measurement Setup Recall
features.description: Enables saving and recalling up to 20 measurement setups with user-defined names for efficient testing

features.title: Multiple Interfaces
features.description: Features standard RS232, GPIB, USB, or LAN interfaces for external control

specifications.heading: Measurement Functions
content: Impedance (Z), Phase Angle (Ø), Capacitance (C), Dissipation Factor (D), Inductance (L), Quality Factor (Q)
AC Resistance (Rac), Reactance (X), Susceptance (B), Conductance (G), Admittance (Y)
DC Resistance (Rdc) is an option (/R) on all models

specifications.heading: Drive Level (AC measurements)
content: Short circuit: 100 µA to 20 mA rms

specifications.heading: DC Bias Voltage
content: External - up to ±40V may be connected via rear panel

specifications.heading: Measurement Speeds
content: Four selectable speeds for all measurement functions
Up to 50 measurements per second depending on test frequency and setup condition

specifications.heading: Measurement Ranges
content: Z, R, X  0.01 mΩ to > 1 GΩ
Y, B, G  0.1 nS to > 2 kS

specifications.heading: Binning (Optional)
content: User programmable PASS and FAIL bins
list: Option /B1 (non-isolated) - Common 0V. Bin outputs 0 to 5V (nominal) with >10 mA current sink capability
Option /B2 (isolated) - Common 24V input. Outputs 0 to 24V with >10 mA current source capability
